articles.author: Ron Emler
articles.title: How LVMH and Rémy Cointreau results reveal the continuing problem for Cognac - The Drinks Business
articles.description: Last year was a record one for luxury goods group Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton (LVMH) although the pace of sales growth slowed from 2022.
articles.content: Last year was a record one for luxury goods group Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton (LVMH) although the pace of sales growth slowed from 2022, but Rémy Cointreau results show the continuing issue for Cogna… [+3439 chars]
